subject: chain of test (was: Re: [junit] Request features)
msgSnippet: ... JUnitExt provides something very similar to this with its @Prerequisite notation: http://junitext.sourceforge.net/ Would that do what you need? David Saff
messageBody:
On 3/27/07, BrianHks <Brianhks@...> wrote:
> 2. It would be nice to have a chain of test where if one failed it
> would quit and not run any more. Maybe this is already available. If
> it is please let me know how to do it.

JUnitExt provides something very similar to this with its
@Prerequisite notation:

http://junitext.sourceforge.net/

Would that do what you need?

David Saff
